software_engineer.education: B.Tech/B.E./BS in Computer Science or related field
software_engineer.description: Design, develop, test, and maintain software applications using modern programming languages, frameworks, and software engineering best practices. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver scalable solutions.
software_engineer.default_jd: We are looking for a skilled Software Engineer to join our development team. You will design, develop, and maintain high-quality software solutions. Responsibilities include writing clean, efficient code in Python/Java/JavaScript, participating in code reviews, designing system architectures, and collaborating with product and QA teams. You should have strong knowledge of data structures, algorithms, and object-oriented programming. Experience with REST APIs, SQL databases, and version control (Git) is required. Familiarity with cloud platforms (AWS/GCP/Azure), containerization (Docker), and CI/CD pipelines is preferred. Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or equivalent with 2+ years of experience.

backend_developer.education: B.Tech/B.E./BS in Computer Science or related field
backend_developer.description: Build and maintain server-side applications, APIs, and database systems. Ensure scalability, performance, and security of backend infrastructure.
backend_developer.default_jd: We are seeking a Backend Developer to build robust server-side applications and APIs. You will design and implement RESTful APIs, manage database schemas, optimize query performance, and ensure system reliability. Strong proficiency in Python or Node.js, SQL databases (PostgreSQL/MySQL), and Redis caching is required. Experience with Docker, microservices architecture, and message queues is expected. Knowledge of cloud platforms, Kubernetes, and CI/CD pipelines is a plus. You should be comfortable with Linux environments, version control, and writing comprehensive tests. 2+ years backend development experience required.

frontend_developer.education: B.Tech/B.E./BS in Computer Science or related field
frontend_developer.description: Create responsive, performant user interfaces using modern JavaScript frameworks. Translate UI/UX designs into pixel-perfect, accessible web applications.
frontend_developer.default_jd: We are hiring a Frontend Developer to build beautiful, responsive web applications. You will work closely with designers and backend engineers to create seamless user experiences. Proficiency in JavaScript/TypeScript, React (or Vue/Angular), HTML5, and CSS3 is required. Experience with state management, REST API integration, and responsive design patterns is expected. Knowledge of Next.js, Tailwind CSS, testing frameworks (Jest/Cypress), and web accessibility standards is preferred. Strong eye for detail and understanding of UI/UX principles required. 2+ years frontend development experience.

full_stack_developer.education: B.Tech/B.E./BS in Computer Science or related field
full_stack_developer.description: Develop end-to-end web applications spanning frontend, backend, and database layers. Own features from design through deployment.
full_stack_developer.default_jd: We need a Full Stack Developer who can work across the entire application stack. Responsibilities include building React frontends, developing Node.js/Python backend services, designing database schemas, and deploying to cloud platforms. Strong knowledge of JavaScript/TypeScript, REST APIs, SQL and NoSQL databases required. Experience with Docker, CI/CD, and cloud services (AWS/GCP) expected. You should be comfortable owning features end-to-end. 3+ years full stack experience required.

devops_engineer.education: B.Tech/B.E./BS in Computer Science or related field
devops_engineer.description: Build and maintain CI/CD pipelines, container orchestration, infrastructure as code, and monitoring systems to enable rapid, reliable software delivery.
devops_engineer.default_jd: We are looking for a DevOps Engineer to streamline our development and deployment processes. You will design CI/CD pipelines, manage Kubernetes clusters, implement infrastructure as code with Terraform, and set up comprehensive monitoring. Strong Linux skills, Docker, Kubernetes, and cloud platform experience (AWS/GCP/Azure) required. Proficiency with scripting (Python/Bash), configuration management (Ansible), and monitoring tools (Prometheus/Grafana) expected. 3+ years DevOps experience required.

site_reliability_engineer.education: B.Tech/B.E./BS in Computer Science or related field
site_reliability_engineer.description: Ensure system reliability, availability, and performance through automation, monitoring, incident response, and capacity planning at scale.
site_reliability_engineer.default_jd: We are hiring a Site Reliability Engineer to ensure our systems are reliable, scalable, and performant. You will implement SLOs/SLIs, automate operational tasks, manage incident response, and drive reliability improvements. Deep Linux expertise, strong programming skills (Python/Go), and cloud infrastructure experience required. Knowledge of Kubernetes, monitoring stacks, and distributed systems expected. 4+ years SRE or systems engineering experience required.

cloud_engineer.education: B.Tech/B.E./BS in Computer Science or related field
cloud_engineer.description: Design, deploy, and manage cloud infrastructure and services. Implement cloud-native architectures with focus on scalability, security, and cost optimization.
cloud_engineer.default_jd: We need a Cloud Engineer to architect and manage our cloud infrastructure. Responsibilities include designing scalable architectures on AWS/GCP/Azure, implementing infrastructure as code, managing networking and security, and optimizing costs. Strong experience with AWS services, Terraform, Docker, and Kubernetes required. Python scripting and CI/CD pipeline experience expected. Cloud certifications preferred. 3+ years cloud engineering experience required.

cloud_architect.education: B.Tech/M.Tech in Computer Science or related field
cloud_architect.description: Design enterprise-scale cloud architectures, establish best practices, and guide organizations through cloud migrations and transformations.
cloud_architect.default_jd: We seek a Cloud Architect to design and oversee enterprise cloud infrastructure. You will create cloud adoption strategies, design multi-region architectures, establish security and governance frameworks, and mentor engineering teams. Deep expertise in AWS/Azure/GCP, microservices, and distributed systems required. Experience leading large-scale cloud migrations and implementing Well-Architected Framework principles expected. 7+ years experience with 3+ in architecture roles.

solutions_architect.education: B.Tech/M.Tech in Computer Science or related field
solutions_architect.description: Design technical solutions that address business requirements, evaluating trade-offs and ensuring alignment with enterprise architecture standards.
solutions_architect.default_jd: We are looking for a Solutions Architect to design and validate technical solutions for complex business problems. You will evaluate technologies, create architecture blueprints, lead proof-of-concept efforts, and collaborate with stakeholders to ensure solutions meet requirements. Broad technical expertise spanning cloud, databases, APIs, and security required. Excellent communication and presentation skills essential. 6+ years experience with architecture or senior engineering background.

systems_engineer.education: B.Tech/B.E. in Computer Science, IT, or Electronics
systems_engineer.description: Design, configure, and maintain computing systems and infrastructure. Ensure system performance, security, and reliability across the enterprise.
systems_engineer.default_jd: We need a Systems Engineer to manage and optimize our computing infrastructure. Responsibilities include server provisioning, network configuration, system monitoring, security hardening, and performance tuning. Strong Linux and Windows Server skills, networking knowledge (TCP/IP, DNS, DHCP), and scripting abilities required. Experience with virtualization, storage systems, and monitoring tools expected. 3+ years experience.

qa_engineer.education: B.Tech/B.E./BS in Computer Science or related field
qa_engineer.description: Design and execute comprehensive test strategies to ensure software quality. Identify defects, automate test suites, and drive quality improvements.
qa_engineer.default_jd: We are hiring a QA Engineer to ensure the quality of our software products. You will design test plans, write and execute test cases, automate regression tests, and collaborate with developers to resolve defects. Proficiency in Selenium/Cypress, Python, SQL, and API testing required. Experience with test management tools (Jira), CI/CD integration, and performance testing preferred. 2+ years QA experience required.

test_automation_engineer.education: B.Tech/B.E./BS in Computer Science or related field
test_automation_engineer.description: Build and maintain automated testing frameworks, reducing manual testing effort and enabling faster release cycles with comprehensive coverage.
test_automation_engineer.default_jd: We need a Test Automation Engineer to design and implement our automated testing infrastructure. You will build test frameworks, automate UI and API tests, integrate with CI/CD pipelines, and establish testing best practices. Strong programming skills (Python/JavaScript), Selenium/Cypress experience, and CI/CD knowledge required. 3+ years test automation experience required.

data_analyst.description: Analyze large datasets to extract actionable insights, create dashboards and reports, and support data-driven decision making across the organization.
data_analyst.default_jd: We are looking for a Data Analyst to turn raw data into actionable business insights. You will write complex SQL queries, build interactive dashboards (Tableau/Power BI), conduct statistical analyses, and present findings to stakeholders. Strong SQL, Python/Pandas, and data visualization skills required. Excel proficiency and understanding of statistical methods expected. 1+ years experience in data analytics.

data_engineer.education: B.Tech/B.E. in Computer Science or related field
data_engineer.description: Design and build data pipelines, warehouses, and lakes that enable reliable, scalable data processing for analytics and machine learning.
data_engineer.default_jd: We need a Data Engineer to build and maintain our data infrastructure. You will design ETL/ELT pipelines, manage data warehouses, ensure data quality, and support analytics and ML teams. Strong Python, SQL, and Spark experience required. Knowledge of workflow orchestration (Airflow), cloud data services (AWS/GCP), and data modeling best practices expected. 3+ years data engineering experience.

data_scientist.education: M.Tech/M.Sc./MS in Computer Science, Statistics, or related field
data_scientist.description: Apply statistical modeling, machine learning, and data analysis to solve complex business problems and drive data-informed decisions.
data_scientist.default_jd: We are hiring a Data Scientist to build predictive models and extract insights from complex datasets. You will formulate hypotheses, build ML models, conduct A/B tests, and communicate findings to stakeholders. Strong Python, scikit-learn, statistics, and SQL skills required. Experience with deep learning frameworks and NLP is a plus. M.S. or equivalent experience in quantitative field preferred. 2+ years data science experience.

ml_engineer.education: B.Tech/M.Tech in Computer Science, AI/ML, or related field
ml_engineer.description: Design, train, deploy, and monitor machine learning models in production. Bridge the gap between data science experimentation and production engineering.
ml_engineer.default_jd: We need an ML Engineer to productionize and scale our machine learning systems. You will build training pipelines, deploy models as APIs, implement monitoring, and optimize inference performance. Strong Python, PyTorch/TensorFlow, and Docker experience required. Knowledge of MLOps tools (MLflow, Kubeflow), cloud ML services, and distributed computing expected. 3+ years ML engineering experience.

ai_research_scientist.education: Ph.D. or M.Tech in AI, ML, Computer Science, or related field
ai_research_scientist.description: Conduct original research in artificial intelligence and machine learning, publish papers, and translate research breakthroughs into practical applications.
ai_research_scientist.default_jd: We are looking for an AI Research Scientist to push the boundaries of AI/ML. You will conduct original research, publish in top venues (NeurIPS, ICML, CVPR), prototype new algorithms, and collaborate with engineering to deploy innovations. Ph.D. or equivalent research experience in ML/AI required. Deep expertise in PyTorch, mathematical foundations of ML, and publication track record expected. 5+ years research experience.

nlp_engineer.education: B.Tech/M.Tech in Computer Science or Computational Linguistics
nlp_engineer.description: Build natural language processing systems including text classification, named entity recognition, sentiment analysis, and conversational AI.
nlp_engineer.default_jd: We need an NLP Engineer to build and deploy natural language understanding systems. You will develop text classification, NER, and conversational AI models using transformer architectures. Strong Python, PyTorch, and HuggingFace Transformers experience required. Knowledge of LLMs, prompt engineering, and NLP evaluation methodologies expected. 3+ years NLP experience.

computer_vision_engineer.education: B.Tech/M.Tech in Computer Science or related field
computer_vision_engineer.description: Design and implement computer vision systems for image classification, object detection, segmentation, and visual understanding applications.
computer_vision_engineer.default_jd: We are hiring a Computer Vision Engineer to build visual AI systems. You will design object detection, classification, and segmentation models for production deployment. Strong Python, PyTorch, and OpenCV experience required. Knowledge of CNN architectures, transfer learning, and model optimization for edge deployment expected. 3+ years computer vision experience.

deep_learning_engineer.education: B.Tech/M.Tech in Computer Science, AI/ML, or related field
deep_learning_engineer.description: Design novel deep learning architectures, train large-scale models, and optimize inference for production deployment across various AI domains.
deep_learning_engineer.default_jd: We need a Deep Learning Engineer to design and train neural network models at scale. You will architect novel DL models, optimize training on multi-GPU setups, and deploy models for production inference. Strong PyTorch/TensorFlow, CUDA programming, and distributed training experience required. 3+ years deep learning experience.

bi_analyst.description: Design interactive dashboards, build data models, and deliver business insights through reporting and analytics to drive strategic decision-making.
bi_analyst.default_jd: We are looking for a BI Analyst to build dashboards and deliver data-driven insights. Strong SQL, visualization, and data modeling skills required. 2+ years BI experience.

big_data_engineer.education: B.Tech/M.Tech in Computer Science or related field
big_data_engineer.description: Design and operate large-scale data processing systems using distributed computing frameworks for petabyte-scale data workloads.

Strong Spark, Hadoop, and cloud experience required. 4+ years big data experience.

ios_developer.education: B.Tech/B.E./BS in Computer Science or related field

android_developer.description: Build Android applications using Kotlin and Jetpack Compose, focusing on performance, material design, and Play Store quality standards.

flutter_developer.description: Create beautiful cross-platform mobile and web applications using Flutter and Dart with smooth animations and native performance.

blockchain_developer.education: B.Tech/B.E./BS in Computer Science or related field
blockchain_developer.description: Develop smart contracts, decentralized applications, and blockchain protocols. Build secure, transparent systems on distributed ledger technology.
blockchain_developer.default_jd: We are looking for a Blockchain Developer to build decentralized applications and smart contracts. Strong Solidity, JavaScript, and cryptography knowledge required. 2+ years blockchain development experience.

game_developer.education: B.Tech/B.E./BS in Computer Science or Game Design
game_developer.description: Design and develop interactive games and real-time simulations using game engines, 3D graphics, and physics systems.
game_developer.default_jd: We are hiring a Game Developer to create engaging interactive experiences. You will implement gameplay mechanics, optimize rendering performance, and build game systems. Strong C++/C#, Unity or Unreal Engine experience required. Knowledge of 3D math, physics, and game design principles expected. 2+ years game development experience.

arvr_developer.education: B.Tech/B.E./BS in Computer Science or related field
arvr_developer.description: Build augmented and virtual reality applications using spatial computing frameworks, 3D engines, and interaction design principles.
arvr_developer.default_jd: We need an AR/VR Developer to create immersive applications. You will build XR experiences using Unity/Unreal, implement spatial interactions, and optimize for target platforms (Quest, HoloLens, etc.). Strong Unity/C#, 3D math, and computer vision experience required. 2+ years AR/VR development experience.

embedded_software_engineer.education: B.Tech/B.E. in Electronics, Computer Science, or Embedded Systems
embedded_software_engineer.description: Develop firmware and software for embedded systems, microcontrollers, and IoT devices with real-time constraints and resource limitations.
embedded_software_engineer.default_jd: We are hiring an Embedded Software Engineer to develop firmware for IoT and embedded devices. You will write C/C++ for microcontrollers, implement communication protocols (UART/SPI/I2C), optimize for power and memory, and debug hardware-software interactions. Strong C/C++, RTOS, and embedded systems experience required. 3+ years embedded development experience.

firmware_engineer.education: B.Tech/B.E. in Electronics or Computer Engineering
firmware_engineer.description: Write low-level firmware for hardware platforms, manage boot sequences, device drivers, and hardware abstraction layers.
firmware_engineer.default_jd: We need a Firmware Engineer to develop low-level software for hardware platforms. You will write device drivers, implement bootloaders, manage interrupts, and perform hardware bring-up. Strong C/Assembly, microcontroller, and RTOS expertise required. Experience with debug tools (JTAG, oscilloscope) expected. 3+ years firmware experience.

uiux_designer.education: B.Des/B.Tech/BA in Design, HCI, or related field
uiux_designer.description: Design intuitive, accessible user interfaces and experiences through user research, wireframing, prototyping, and visual design.
uiux_designer.default_jd: We are hiring a UI/UX Designer to create beautiful, user-centered designs. You will conduct user research, create wireframes and prototypes, build design systems, and collaborate with developers. Strong Figma, UX research, and visual design skills required. 2+ years UI/UX experience.

cybersecurity_engineer.education: B.Tech/B.E. in Computer Science, IT, or Cybersecurity
cybersecurity_engineer.description: Protect organization's digital assets by implementing security controls, conducting vulnerability assessments, and managing security infrastructure.
cybersecurity_engineer.default_jd: We need a Cybersecurity Engineer to protect our infrastructure and data. You will implement security controls, conduct vulnerability assessments, manage SIEM tools, and lead incident response. Strong knowledge of network security, firewalls, encryption, and security frameworks (NIST/ISO 27001) required. 3+ years cybersecurity experience.

security_analyst.education: B.Tech/B.E. in Computer Science, IT, or Cybersecurity
security_analyst.description: Monitor security events, analyze threats, investigate incidents, and maintain security posture through continuous assessment and improvement.
security_analyst.default_jd: We are hiring a Security Analyst to monitor and protect our systems. You will analyze security events, investigate incidents, manage vulnerability scanning, and maintain compliance. Strong SIEM, networking, and incident response skills required. 2+ years security analysis experience.

penetration_tester.education: B.Tech/B.E. in Computer Science or Cybersecurity
penetration_tester.description: Conduct authorized simulated attacks to identify security vulnerabilities in applications, networks, and infrastructure before malicious actors exploit them.
penetration_tester.default_jd: We are looking for a Penetration Tester to assess our security posture. You will conduct web, network, and infrastructure penetration tests, write detailed reports, and recommend remediations. Strong knowledge of OWASP, Burp Suite, Metasploit, and scripting required. Certifications (CEH/OSCP) preferred. 3+ years penetration testing experience.

network_engineer.education: B.Tech/B.E. in IT, Computer Science, or Electronics
network_engineer.description: Design, implement, and maintain computer network infrastructure including LANs, WANs, VPNs, and wireless networks.
network_engineer.default_jd: We need a Network Engineer to manage our enterprise network. network_architect.education: B.Tech/M.Tech in IT, Computer Science, or related field
network_architect.description: Design enterprise-scale network architectures, establish networking standards, and plan network evolution strategies for large organizations.
network_architect.default_jd: We seek a Network Architect to design our next-generation network infrastructure. Deep networking expertise across routing, security, and cloud networking required. 7+ years networking experience with architecture focus.

electrical_engineer.description: Design and develop electrical systems, power distribution networks, control circuits, and electrical equipment for various industrial and commercial applications.
electrical_engineer.default_jd: We are hiring an Electrical Engineer to design electrical systems and power distribution. You will create circuit designs, perform load calculations, select equipment, and ensure compliance with electrical codes (NEC/IEC). Strong knowledge of power systems, MATLAB, and AutoCAD required. 2+ years electrical engineering experience.

Strong analog/digital electronics, PCB design (Altium/OrCAD), and testing skills required. 2+ years electronics design experience.

power_systems_engineer.description: Design and analyze power generation, transmission, and distribution systems ensuring reliability, efficiency, and regulatory compliance.
power_systems_engineer.default_jd: We need a Power Systems Engineer for our energy infrastructure projects. Strong ETAP/MATLAB, protection systems, and power engineering knowledge required. 3+ years power systems experience.

control_systems_engineer.default_jd: We are hiring a Control Systems Engineer for industrial automation projects. Strong PLC (Siemens/Allen-Bradley), MATLAB/Simulink, and control theory knowledge required. 3+ years controls experience.

instrumentation_engineer.description: Design and maintain measurement and control instrumentation for process industries including sensor selection, calibration, and loop design.

Strong instrumentation, P&ID reading, and PLC/SCADA knowledge required. 2+ years instrumentation experience.

signal_processing_engineer.education: B.Tech/M.Tech in ECE, Signal Processing, or related field
signal_processing_engineer.description: Design and implement digital signal processing algorithms for audio, communications, radar, and biomedical applications.
signal_processing_engineer.default_jd: We are hiring a Signal Processing Engineer to develop DSP algorithms. Strong MATLAB, C++, and DSP theory required. 3+ years signal processing experience.

telecom_engineer.default_jd: We need a Telecommunications Engineer to design and support our network infrastructure. manufacturing_engineer.description: Design and optimize manufacturing processes, improve production efficiency, implement quality systems, and drive continuous improvement initiatives.
